Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Fairest Flowers of the World" series (N106), issued in a set of 50 cards in 1888 to promote Honest Long Cut Tobacco, manufactured by W. Duke Sons & Co. The cards pair a famous actress of the day with a flower surrounded by a floral design. There are seven different border designs in this set.
